channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- Wildfly
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- Wildfly

item.title: CVE-2018-1047|2024-08-05T03:44:12.035Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- wildfly
item.description: A flaw was found in Wildfly 9.x. A path traversal vulnerability through the org.wildfly.extension.undertow.deployment.ServletResourceManager.getResource method could lead to information disclosure of arbitrary local files.
